item.title: 2. Personalising our CRM by adding charts
item.description: Learning Aim: Introducing building new charts Prerequisites: To be a competent user of agilebase, with Citizen Developer level 1 (or higher) enabled Introduction This short guide is going to introduce to you graphing features that becomes available to you once youâ€™ve been given the role of Citizen Developer. [guide 2 - video 2] Adding a Chart Navigate to the view containing the data for your chart As a Citizen Developer level 1 you are able to add charts to your own views.
